page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
Our community policeman is a school governor and comes to see us often in school. His job is to patrol the community and keep it safe for us all. He works from Poulton-le-Fylde police station and is very friendly. The police in our area are always very busy especially on the first Saturday of May as it is the annual Poulton gala. ************************************** PAGES 11 TO 20 HAVE BEEN COMPILED BY PUPILS OF CLASSES 6 AND 7, CARLETON GREEN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL, ARUNDEL DRIVE, CARLETON GREEN, POULTON-LE-FYLDE, LANCASHIRE. FY6 7TF
JULY 1985
